(Ummm...the Otyebis is a behemoth of a ship...errr...I don't think you could 
hear the announcements...or maybe you could, dang it, now I'm confused!  
Great! :)

Otyebis Staff:


There were three incoming objects.  Two of them, the skimmers, were okay.  
The third, a Cybertronian identified as a member of the Autobot faction, was 
not invited and obviously chasing IGL property.  With a quick relay between 
the President a few defensive cannons were brought online, a dozen armed 
guards summoned, and a message sent to Grimlock.

"Cybertronian, stop your pursuit or we will obliterate you."
